sqlMap.insert: insert into document ( DOCID, DOCCHANNEL, DOCTYPE , DOCTITLE , DOCSOURCE , DOCSTATUS , DOCCONTENT , DOCHTMLCON, DOCABSTRACT , DOCKEYWORDS , DOCAUTHOR , DOCPUBURL , DOCPUBTIME , DOCRELTIME , CRUSER , CRTIME, DOCWORDSCOUNT , TITLECOLOR , TEMPLATEID , HITSCOUNT , DOCPUBHTMLCON , SUBDOCTITLE , ATTACHPIC , DOCFILENAME , DOCSOURCENAME, userid, oldid ) values( #docid#, #docchannel#, #doctype#, #doctitle#, #docsource#, #docstatus#, #doccontent#, #dochtmlcon#, #docabstract#, #dockeywords#, #docauthor#, #docpuburl#, #docpubtime#, #docreltime#, #cruser#, #crtime#, #docwordscount#, #titlecolor#, #templateid#, #hitscount#, #docpubhtmlcon#, #subdoctitle#, #attachpic#, #docfilename#, #docsourcename#, #userid#, #oldid# )
sqlMap.select:
select * from document
docid=#docid#
docid in ($docids$)
docchannel=#channelid#
DOCSTATUS=#status#
userid=#userid#
doctype=#doctype#
exists(select 1 from topdocument where topdocument.docid=document.docid and topdocument.type=#top# and #currentday#>= topdocument.startdate and #currentday#<=topdocument.enddate )
instr(DOCAUTHOR,trim(#authorname#))>0
instr(DOCTITLE,trim(#doctitle#))>0
crtime>=#strcrtime#
crtime<=#endcrtime#

select document.*,(select channel.CHNLNAME from channel where channel.CHANNELID=document.DOCCHANNEL ) as chnaname from document
docid=#docid#
docid in ($docids$)
docchannel=#channelid#
DOCSTATUS=#status#
userid=#userid#
doctype=#doctype#
exists(select 1 from topdocument where topdocument.docid=document.docid and topdocument.type=#top# and #currentday#>= topdocument.startdate and #currentday#<=topdocument.enddate )
instr(DOCAUTHOR,trim(#authorname#))>0
instr(DOCTITLE,trim(#doctitle#))>0
crtime>=#strcrtime#
crtime<=#endcrtime#
order by crtime asc limit #startindex#, #displaydoccount#

select count(1) from document
docid=#docid#
docid in ($docids$)
docchannel=#channelid#
DOCSTATUS=#status#
userid=#userid#
doctype=#doctype#
exists(select 1 from topdocument where topdocument.docid=document.docid and topdocument.type=#top# and #currentday#>= topdocument.startdate and #currentday#<=topdocument.enddate )
instr(DOCAUTHOR,trim(#authorname#))>0
instr(DOCTITLE,trim(#doctitle#))>0
crtime>=#strcrtime#
crtime<=#endcrtime#
select DISTINCT a.* from channel a,document b where a.CHANNELID=b.DOCCHANNEL and b.DOCSTATUS=1

SELECT a.doctitle, b.docid from document a, channeldoc b where a.DOCCHANNEL=b.channelid and a.DOCID=b.docid
b.channelid=#channelid#

SELECT document.*,IFNULL(document.readcount,0) as ireadcount FROM document
docchannel=#docchannel#
doctype=#doctype#
docstatus=#docstatus#
userid=#userid#
exists(select 1 from imggroup,img where imggroup.imggroupid=img.imggroupid and img.imgid=document.docid and imggroup.imggroupid=#imggroupid# )
ORDER BY document.DOCRELTIME desc LIMIT #startrow#, #endrow#

SELECT count(1) FROM document
docchannel=#docchannel#
doctype=#doctype#
userid=#userid#
docstatus=#docstatus#
exists(select 1 from imggroup,img where imggroup.imggroupid=img.imggroupid and img.imgid=document.docid and imggroup.imggroupid=#imggroupid# )
sqlMap.update: update document set readcount=IFNULL(readcount,0)+1 where docid=#docid#
sqlMap.insert: insert into message ( messageid, messagesenderid, messagesendername, messagecont, sendtime, userid, resourcekind, resourceid, messtime, messtype, received, hidden, oldid )values( #messageid#, #messagesenderid#, #messagesendername#, #messagecont#, #sendtime#, #userid#, #resourcekind#, #resourceid#, #messtime#, #messtype#, 0, #hidden#, #oldid# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT message.*,user.artname FROM message ,user where message.userid=USER.userid
resourceid=#resourceid#
resourcekind=#resourcekind#
message.userid=#userid#
message.messagesenderid=#messagesenderid#
message.messageid=#messageid#
message.received=#received#
message.received=0
message.status=#status#
ORDER BY message.sendtime desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into sharedresource ( originalauthorid, userid, resourceid, resourcekind, sharedate )values( #originalauthorid#, #userid#, #resourceid#, #resourcekind#, #sharedate# )
insert into markedresource ( originalauthorid, userid, resourceid, resourcekind, markeddate )values( #originalauthorid#, #userid#, #resourceid#, #resourcekind#, #markeddate# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM message ,user where message.messagesenderid=USER.userid
resourceid=#resourceid#
resourcekind=#resourcekind#
ORDER BY message.sendtime desc

select * from document where exists (select 1 from friend where friend.friendid = document.userid and friend.userid = #userid#) and document.DOCRELTIME >= #lastTenDay# and document.DOCRELTIME <= #currentDate# order by DOCRELTIME LIMIT #start#, #end#
sqlMap.update:
update document set DOCCONTENT=#doccontent#
DOCTITLE= #doctitle#
DOCCHANNEL= #docchannel#
DOCTYPE= #doctype#
DOCABSTRACT= #docabstract#
compiler= #compiler#
where docid=#docid# and userid=#userid#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from message where resourceid=#resourceid# and resourcekind=#resourcekind#
messageid=#messageid#
delete from document where docid=#docid# and userid=#userid#
delete from imggroup where userid=#userid# and imggroupid=#imggroupid#
delete from sharedresource where resourceid=#resourceid# and resourcekind=#resourcekind#
delete from markedresource where resourceid=#resourceid# and resourcekind=#resourcekind#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE document set document.DOCSTATUS=#status# where document.DOCID=#docid#
sqlMap.insert: insert into topdocument ( docid , type , startdate , enddate , playindex , docimg , checkuserid , groupid )values( #docid# , #toptype# , #startdate# , #enddate# , #playindex# , #docimg# , #checkuserid# , #groupid# )
sqlMap.select:
select a.*,b.doctitle as title from topdocument a,document b where a.docid=b.docid
type=#type#
startdate<=#fetchDate# and enddate>=#fetchDate#
docid=#docid#
LIMIT 0, #limit#

SELECT messageid , messagesenderid , messagesendername , messagecont, messagesenderimgurl , sendtime, message.userid, resourcekind , resourceid , messtime, received , messtype, receiverid , if(#recorsend#=1,messagesendername,(select artname from user where user.userid=message.userid)) artname FROM message ,user
message.userid=USER.userid and messagesenderid!=#userid#
message.messagesenderid=USER.userid and message.userid!=#userid#
message.messagesenderid=#messagesenderid#
message.userid=#receiveid#
message.messageid=#messageid#
message.received=#received#
message.messtype=#messtype#
ORDER BY message.sendtime desc
sqlMap.update: update message set message.received=1 where message.messageid=#messageid#
sqlMap.select:
select * from document
exists(select 1 from img,imggroup where img.imggroupid=imggroup.imggroupid and img.imgid=document.docid and imggroup.imggroupid=#imggroupid#)
document.docid>#docid#
order by document.docid desc limit 1

select * from document
exists(select 1 from img,imggroup where img.imggroupid=imggroup.imggroupid and img.imgid=document.docid and imggroup.imggroupid=#imggroupid#)
document.docid<#docid#
order by document.docid asc limit 1
select * from message where messageid=#messid#
select count(1) from message where userid=#userid# and messtype in (3,4)
select count(1) from sharedresource where userid=#userid# and resourceid=#resourceid#
select count(1) from markedresource where userid=#userid# and resourceid=#resourceid#

select count(1) from sharedresource a , document b where a.resourceid=b.docid and b.userid=a.originalauthorid
a.userid=#userid#
a.resourcekind=#doctype#

select b.* from sharedresource a , document b where a.resourceid=b.docid and b.userid=a.originalauthorid
a.userid=#userid#
b.doctype=#doctype#
order by a.sharedate LIMIT #start#, #rowcount#

select b.* from sharedresource a , img b where a.resourceid=b.imgid and b.imgid=a.originalauthorid
a.userid=#userid#
b.doctype=#doctype#
order by a.sharedate LIMIT #start#, #rowcount#
sqlMap.update:
update document set docid=#docid#
commcount=IFNULL(commcount,0)+1
commcount=IFNULL(commcount,0)-1
where docid=#docid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT message.*,user.artname FROM message ,user where message.userid=USER.userid
resourceid=#resourceid#
resourcekind=#resourcekind#
messtype=#messtype#
ORDER BY message.sendtime desc LIMIT #startindex#, #fechcount#
select * from document order by document.readcount desc limit #startindex#,#fechcount#

SELECT message.*,user.artname FROM message ,user where message.userid=USER.userid
resourcekind=#resourcekind#
user.artname like '%'||#artname#||'%'
sendtime>=#strcrtime#
sendtime<=#endcrtime#
message.status=#status#
ORDER BY message.sendtime desc limit #startindex#,#fechcount#

SELECT count(1) FROM message ,user where message.userid=USER.userid
resourcekind=#resourcekind#
user.artname like '%'||#artname#||'%'
sendtime>=#strcrtime#
sendtime<=#endcrtime#
message.status=#status#
